com.xebialabs.overthere.cifs
Class CifsConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.xebialabs.overthere.OverthereConnection
      com.xebialabs.overthere.cifs.CifsConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CifsTelnetConnection, CifsWinRmConnection
public abstract class CifsConnection
extends OverthereConnection

Base class for connections to a Windows host using CIFS. Limitations:

  • Shares with names like C$ need to available for all drives accessed. In practice, this means that Administrator access is needed.
  • Not tested with domain accounts.

public CifsConnection(java.lang.String protocol,
